page.title: 07 Knowle Fields Garage
page.content: The Knowle Fields Garage is situated near Weethley and owned by Mr. Gee.It opens at about half past seven untill quarter to seven at night,but on Sundays it opens at eight and closes at one in the afternoon.As they live on the premises Mr.and Mrs.Gee start work as soon as they get up. The customers are mainly just passers by,but some local people also use the garage.As well as selling petrol and cars they do repairs and hire out vehicles.Petrol brings the most money especially in the summer. Originally the site was a farm,then a transport cafe,then the Gees turned it into a garage,but they still kept nine acres of land.They have two employees; one to work the petrol pumps and the other to help in the workshop.
